title: Cal State San Marcos (CSUSM) Esports?
body:
Im new to CSUSM and I was wondering if we have an esports club at our college?
If not lets make one!
Post if u play LoL and go to CSUSM, and or any other games!

if anyone wants a Esports club / team there is a poll. Please state your opinion!

replies.body:
If y'all need the CSUSM club tag, I got it.

xAdrenalin3
Add me to the team! shoot me an invite! username is: daddelao
I think it's a great idea if it's still going on please do let me know

> [{quoted}](name=TheJaySquiddler,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=iclJeZWA,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-12T20:13:47.033+0000)
>
> I think it's a great idea if it's still going on please do let me know

Email me at sumne007@cougars.csusm.edu! we are starting up the club!
I will send you an invite to our in client club as well "CSUSM LoL"!
See you on the rift!
I know this is late but I will be attending CSUSM next Fall so this is something I would consider getting into.
Hey sorry, haven't checked forums in a while. Don't worry, i will send you an invite to our club now, today!

Check out the uLoL club map to see if your school has a club! http://ulol.leagueoflegends.com/find-a-club.html

If it isn't there, you can start one and then have it registered!  Take a look at the top bar of that page for the FAQ and other goodies. =)

> [{quoted}](name=Tiza,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=iclJeZWA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-02-27T03:53:50.947+0000)
>
> Check out the uLoL club map to see if your school has a club! http://ulol.leagueoflegends.com/find-a-club.html
> 
> If it isn't there, you can start one and then have it registered!  Take a look at the top bar of that page for the FAQ and other goodies. =)

Thank you very much for the information, it looks as though the CSUSM campus does not have a LoL e-sports club, however I have one more question. I am not familiar with which organizations are affiliated with League of Legends to host Collegiate e-Sports. I have heard about NCeSPA and I was wondering whether your company is connected? If so how do i proceed? I know that their are other e-Sports categories such as CS:GO and Dota, and I wish to involve those games in the club to create a broader scope! If League is separate or affiliated with another organization I would love guidance to where I should go. Thank You!

> [{quoted}](name=Camel Flipper,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=iclJeZWA,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-03-07T19:49:44.893+0000)
>
> Thank you very much for the information, it looks as though the CSUSM campus does not have a LoL e-sports club, however I have one more question. I am not familiar with which organizations are affiliated with League of Legends to host Collegiate e-Sports. I have heard about NCeSPA and I was wondering whether your company is connected? If so how do i proceed? I know that their are other e-Sports categories such as CS:GO and Dota, and I wish to involve those games in the club to create a broader scope! If League is separate or affiliated with another organization I would love guidance to where I should go. Thank You!

We work a little bit with a few of the collegiate orgs, but we don't have an official 3rd-party org.  Any of them are good!

> [{quoted}](name=Linthe,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=iclJeZWA,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2016-03-07T19:56:08.087+0000)
>
> Somehow that map doesn't seem to be up to date.. It doesn't show UC IRvine as having one but I watched them play UCLA a couple of weeks ago... And they are listed in the campus series :P

Might not be - I'm not actually involved, just sharing a helpful link.  I do know UCI has a LoL club, although NACC teams aren't necessarily connected to a club.

> [{quoted}](name=Tiza,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=iclJeZWA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-02-27T03:53:50.947+0000)
>
> Check out the uLoL club map to see if your school has a club! http://ulol.leagueoflegends.com/find-a-club.html
> 
> If it isn't there, you can start one and then have it registered!  Take a look at the top bar of that page for the FAQ and other goodies. =)

Somehow that map doesn't seem to be up to date.. It doesn't show UC IRvine as having one but I watched them play UCLA a couple of weeks ago... And they are listed in the campus series :P

> [{quoted}](name=Linthe,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=iclJeZWA,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2016-03-07T19:56:08.087+0000)
>
> Somehow that map doesn't seem to be up to date.. It doesn't show UC IRvine as having one but I watched them play UCLA a couple of weeks ago... And they are listed in the campus series :P

Hey, do you perhaps have Steam? I recently joined the CSUSM Steam Group (Camel Flipper)! There are a lot of people in it now so I will be posting some info on this club matter there!
I don't think we have one, but I haven't actually looked tbh. You should feel free to start one though, there are many people on campus that play League.
